bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Started in 2000, this unique organization brings together reproduction brass instruments from the Civil War era. They include bass, tenor, and alto horns, b-flat and e-flat cornets. They play 19th century brass band music. The Cabell-Breckinridge Brass ensemble has traveled to areas of Virginia to play at various functions.

19th Heavy Artillery Battalion was organized in June 1862. This unit was attached to the Department of Richmond and defended the city, as well as Petersburg and other nearby areas, over the course of the war. The unit surrendered in April 1865.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection includes two short histories of the Cabell-Breckinridge Brass Band and the 19th Battalion, Virginia Heavy Artillery, as well as a commemorative pin.
